description: For several years now, Web Components have hovered on the verge of widespread adoption, without quite tipping over the edge. But that doesn't mean they're unusable: for the last two years, we've been deploying custom elements in production at The Seattle Times on a site with millions of pageviews, on many of our most popular articles. Now that browsers have reached consensus on V1 of the custom element spec and are starting implementation, there's no better time to learn how this can work for you.
title: Custom Elements in Production
